title: Emerald and Diamond Nakshi Haaram - PMQN32
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (approx. 5.80 carats). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A stunning Nakshi Haaram featuring meticulously hand-carved gold settings. The central design incorporates teardrop-shaped emeralds surrounded by intricate diamond-studded floral and paisley motifs. Smaller oval and round emeralds are interspersed along the necklace for a vibrant and elegant look. The pendant dangles feature a cluster of diamonds surrounding the emeralds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and other special celebrations. A timeless piece to be treasured for generations.
description: This exquisite Emerald and Diamond Haaram represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The vibrant emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, while the diamonds add a touch of timeless elegance. The Nakshi work is a testament to the artistry and heritage of Hyderabad's skilled jewelers. A valuable investment and a cherished heirloom.
